txt.en: You have completed Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave -- Tier 1.
You have completed Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave -- Tier 2.
You have completed Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave -- Slayer of the Barrow-wights.

Unbeknownst to the Men of Cardolan, Sarch Vorn, an ancient temple of the Edain, has long served as the resting place of a malevolent spirit of the Elder Days known only as Hithrengor, the Grey Fear. Roused by the return of the Witch-king of Angmar, the Grey Fear has awoken from its slumber to once again spread terror and death across the ravaged lands of Cardolan.
You have completed Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave -- Tier 3.
You have completed Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave -- TBD LORE.
